No matter when an election is held to replace Chris Lee , Kirsten Gillibrand is confident his district will be well represented. They have representation right now, through myself and Senator Charles Ellis Schumer , every minute of every day. Senator Charles Ellis Schumer and I are committed to making sure their voice in Washington is as strong as it's ever been. Kirsten Gillibrand also is continuing Chris Lee 's efforts towards helping the victims of Flight 3407. Chris Lee pushed for tougher flight safety legislation after the crash and Kirsten Gillibrand said she will continue to do so.``
